The corporation's records on the distribution of its stock show the amount of shares held in each of the principal foreign ...

headline.main: FOREIGNERS SELLING U.S. STEEL SHARES; Report of U.S. Corporation Shows Decrease of 35,476 in Six Months. CANADA IS AN EXCEPTION Great Britain, Holland, and France, Principal Owners, Have Been Selling Steadily.

docs.snippet: Argentina is testing the sincerity and value of Germany's promises. After the Monte Protegido had been sunk the Berlin Government assured Argentina that in the future her ships would not be attacked. Then the submarines sank the Toro and the Oriana.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina is testing the sincerity and value of Germany's promises. After the Monte Protegido had been sunk the Berlin Government assured Argentina that in the future her ships would not be attacked. Then the submarines sank the Toro and the Oriana.

docs.snippet: Sitting in her cell in the Nassau County Jail at Mineola, L.I., Mrs. Blanca De Saulles, the twenty-threeyear-old wife who killed her divorced husband. " Jack " De Saulles, for fear
docs.lead_paragraph: Sitting in her cell in the Nassau County Jail at Mineola, L.I., Mrs. Blanca De Saulles, the twenty-threeyear-old wife who killed her divorced husband. " Jack " De Saulles, for fear

headline.main: MRS. DE SAULLES TELLS HER STORY OF THE TRAGEDY; Sorrows Began When Husband She Shot Found That Her Wealth Was Small. HE GOT $47,000 FROM HER Money for Obtaining Mission to Uruguay, She Declares, Was Spent on Women. TOOK BOY INTO BARROOMS Mother Says Son Told Her of This and of How His Father Took Him in an Auto with Dancer. Lawyer Confident of Acquittal. MRS. DE SAULLES TELLS HER STORY Sent Her to Parents' Home. Went Riding with "Jo." No Idea of Shooting Then. Practiced Shooting Together. Offered House to Former Wife.

docs.snippet: Mrs. Blanca De Saulles was found by three physicians who examined her last evening to be so seriously ill that she may be removed from her cell in the jail at Mineola to the Nassau County Hospital.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mrs. Blanca De Saulles was found by three physicians who examined her last evening to be so seriously ill that she may be removed from her cell in the jail at Mineola to the Nassau County Hospital.
docs.abstract: seriously ill; Maj. A. B. De Saulles defends dead son in statement; relatives refuse to tell where her son is; Chilean Embassy not asked to protect her interests

headline.main: DOCTORS FEAR FOR MRS.DE SAULLES; BEGS FOR HER SON; Three Find Her So Ill She May Have to be Taken to Nassau Hospital. COLLAPSE COMES IN CELL Relatives of Man She Shot Refuse to Tell Where Prisoner's Little Boy Is.FATHER DEFENDS DEAD MANSays That Calumnies UtteredAgainst His "Jack" Will Proveto be Groundless. Aged Father's Statement. DOCTORS FEAR FOR MRS. DE SAULLES Playing For Boy's Love. CHILE HAS TAKEN NO ACTION. Embassy Not Asked to Protect Interests of Mrs. De Saulles.
